https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9G6tBV10ceuPAuaiMHQ2TSHXKku.jpg Santiago, a twenty-something Argentinean, takes a boat to Montevideo to claim land willed to him by his parents. On his way out of the capitol, he notices Juliette, a young Belgian woman who was also on the boat. After discovering they're heading in the same direction, the two travelers hit the road together. Beyond the Road
